javadoc: Task to show a dialog to enter comments for checking in a file

methods.name: <init>

params.name: parent
params.comment: parent of the version control dialog; may be null

methods.name: showDialog

params.name: addToVersionControl
params.comment:
true if the dialog is for
 adding files to version control, false for checking in files.

params.name: filename
params.comment: the name of the file currently to be added, whose comment we need.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the filesInUse field if any file is in use.
 Call this method from the run() method so that the
 "Keep checked out" checkbox on the dialog is disabled if files
 are still in use.
methods.name: checkFilesInUse
methods.comment:
Sets the filesInUse field if any file is in use.
 Call this method from the run() method so that the
 "Keep checked out" checkbox on the dialog is disabled if files
 are still in use.

name: VersionControlTask
comment: Task to show a dialog to enter comments for checking in a file
